name: Beacon of Hope Emergency Shelter
description: The Beacon of Hope Emergency Shelter provides homeless families and individuals access to overnight and short-term shelter, along with safety net support services. The shelter is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year to ensure no one in Clark County goes hungry or without a place to stay.
source: Verified from official Beacon of Hope website and FindHelp.org
hours_of_operation: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year
notes: Emergency shelter for homeless families and individuals. Provides overnight and short-term shelter with support services. Fax: (859) 385-4604. President contact: (859) 644-5171. Also accessible through 2-1-1 or 866-362-6211 for assistance.
